name: Vanark
overview: Vanark's mission to find and destroy Zero Field is in your hands. Concentration, shooting accuracy and lightning fast reflexes will be required to sustain life as we know it - on Mars. • Four accuracy levels, including auto-adjusting. • Shooter accuracy levels rated from Novice to Ace. • Choice of 5 center and 5 side weapons designed with varying degrees of power, speed and range. • Select a Wing Man with areas of expertise that may include: enemy analysis, route analysis, and actual combat experiences. • Train in the simulator room before entering actual battle. • Vivid graphics and unique 3-D effects.
